Html: I have updated my item cache from Armory, but it's incomplete and naturally certain trink and other special effects are not optimal. Will there be an updated cache for v2x? If not, is there anyone on the net who does this service reliably?

http://rawr.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=230507

We normally keep the release files current, but have no plans to tool the program to the post-4.0 level 80.  Therefore, while we're working hard on getting the new maxlevel version of the program (85) ready for Cata, the program is essentially on "hiatus".  The current release versions are essentially useless in terms of modeling, so updating the item cache is irrelevant.
